      • solveRandom

        public static boolean solveRandom(Grid g)
        Method that solves the grid. It starts the algorithm by a random piece of the grid and checks the other pieces from the left to the right
        Parameters:
        Grid - g the grid to solve
        Returns:
        true if the grid is solved
